sentences.en: " I never misunderstand Ashley, " Melanie replied quietly, though her lips were trembling.
sentences.cn: " 我永远不会误解艾希礼, " 媚兰冷静地回答, 尽管她的嘴唇在颤抖.

sentences.en: Can not stand to misunderstand and wrong, became not bosom friend.
sentences.cn: 经不起误会和冤枉, 就成不了知心朋友.

sentences.en: Don't misunderstand me / what I'm trying to say.
Don't misunderstand what I'm trying to say.
Don’t misunderstand me. She’s a very nice person when you get to know her.
sentences.cn: 不要误解我的意思。你了解她后就会知道她是个很好的人。

sentences.en: He speak so clearly as not to is misunderstand.
sentences.cn: 他把话说得清清楚楚使人不致于误会.

sentences.en: He speaks so clearly as not to be misunderstand.
sentences.cn: 他把话说得清清楚楚使人不至于误会.

sentences.en: His remarks show that he misunderstand my position on the question.
sentences.cn: 他的话说明他误解了我在这一问题上的立场.

sentences.en: I don't want anybody to misunderstand this lunacy.
sentences.cn: 我不想任何人去误解这个精神病.

sentences.en: I think the couple misunderstand each other.
sentences.cn: 我认为这对夫妇未能真正互相了解.

sentences.en: I'm not saying what he did was good, don't misunderstand me.
sentences.cn: 别误会，我并不是说他所做的是好事。

sentences.en: In my eyes, these students totally misunderstand the true meaning of love.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这些人误解了爱的真正意义.

sentences.en: Let there be no mistake about it, ie Don't misunderstand me.
Rachel, you must have misunderstood her! Ellie would never say something like that.
sentences.cn: 雷切尔，你一定是误会她了！埃莉绝不会说那样的话。

sentences.en: She doesn't express her thoughts with precision, so people often misunderstand her.
sentences.cn: 她表达自己的思想不够精确, 因此别人常常误解她的意思.

sentences.en: She had dared her daughter - in - law to misunderstand.
sentences.cn: 她曾挑逗她 儿媳妇 对此产生误解.

sentences.en: She no longer feared that they should misunderstand her.
sentences.cn: 她不再害怕他们会误解她了.

trans.tran_en: to fail to understand someone or something correctly

trans.tran_cn: 误解， 误会， 曲解
trans.tran_en: to fail to understand someone or something correctly
